import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; interface CardOption { value: string; image: string; } @Component({ selector: 'app-card-selection', templateUrl: './card-selection.component.html', styleUrls: ['./card-selection.component.scss'], }) export class CardSelectionComponent { constructor() {} ngOnInit() {} public cardOptions: CardOption[] = [ { value: 'front seat', image: '../../assets/images/front-seat.png' }, { value: 'back seat', image: '../../assets/images/rear-seat.png' }, ]; public selectedCards: string[] = []; public selectedItem: any = {}; setItem(item:any) { this.selectedItem = item; } toggleSelected(cardOption: CardOption) { const index = this.selectedCards.indexOf(cardOption.value); if (index >= 0) { this.selectedCards.splice(index, 1); } else { this.selectedCards.push(cardOption.value); } } }
